mapper.sql: select id, amount, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark, user_id, search_value, before_amount, after_amount, serial_id, type, symbol, admin_parent_ids, u_amount from t_app_wallet_record
mapper.insert:
insert into t_app_wallet_record
amount, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark, user_id, search_value, before_amount, after_amount, serial_id, type, symbol, admin_parent_ids, u_amount,
#{amount}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{remark}, #{userId}, #{searchValue}, #{beforeAmount}, #{afterAmount}, #{serialId}, #{type}, #{symbol}, #{adminParentIds}, #{uAmount},
mapper.delete:
delete from t_app_wallet_record where id in
#{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT SUM( IF ( t.type = 1 ,t.u_amount, 0 )) AS totalRechargeAmount, SUM( IF ( t.type = 3 ,t.u_amount, 0 )) AS totalWingAmount, SUM( IF ( t.type = 50 ,t.u_amount, 0 )) AS totalSubBousAmount, SUM( IF ( t.type = 4 ,t.u_amount, 0 )) AS totalSubAmount, SUM( IF ( t.type = 51 ,t.u_amount, 0 )) AS totalAddAmount, SUM( IF ( t.type = 40 ,t.u_amount, 0 )) AS totalCollectAmount, SUM( IF ( t.type = 5 ,t.u_amount, 0 )) AS betAmount, SUM( IF ( t.type = 9 ,t.u_amount, 0 )) AS rewardAmount, SUM( IF ( t.type = 28 || t.type=29 ,t.u_amount, 0 )) AS totalContractAmount, SUM( IF ( t.type = 6 ,t.u_amount, 0 )) AS totalMattersAmount, t.user_id as userId FROM t_app_wallet_record t
and t.user_id = #{userId}
AND date_format(t.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND date_format(t.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
GROUP BY user_id

SELECT a.user_id AS appUserId, sum( IF ( r.type = 1, r.amount, 0 ) ) AS recharge, sum( IF ( r.type = 2, r.amount, 0 ) ) AS withdraw, sum( IF ( r.type = 3, r.amount, 0 ) ) AS sendBonus, sum( IF ( r.type = 50, r.amount, 0 ) ) AS subBonus, sum( IF ( r.type = 16, r.amount, 0 ) ) AS btcManualScoring, sum( IF ( r.type = 18, r.amount, 0 ) ) AS ethManualScoring, sum( IF ( r.type = 4, r.amount, 0 ) ) AS subAmount, sum( IF ( r.type = 51, r.amount, 0 ) ) AS sendAmount, sum( IF ( r.type = 17, r.amount, 0 ) ) AS btcManualSubdivision, sum( IF ( r.type = 19, r.amount, 0 ) ) AS ethManualSubdivision FROM t_app_user a left join t_app_wallet_record r on r.user_id = a.user_id
and FIND_IN_SET(#{adminParentIds},a.admin_parent_ids)
and a.user_id = #{userId}
GROUP BY a.user_id
SELECT sum( r.amount ) AS statisticsAmount FROM t_app_user a left join t_app_wallet_record r on r.user_id = a.user_id where a.is_test=0;
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(t.u_amount),0) as allWithdraw FROM t_withdraw w LEFT JOIN t_app_wallet_record t ON t.serial_id = w.serial_id WHERE w.`status` = 1 AND w.user_id = #{userId}
select sum(amount) from t_app_wallet_record where user_id=#{userId}
